plays.text: Penalty to Dwayne Roloson 2 minutes for Tripping Paul Kariya served by Cliff Ronning
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Lubomir Sekeras
Goal scored by Kurt Sauer assisted by Steve Rucchin and Dan Bylsma
Penalty to Wes Walz 2 minutes for Slashing Petr Sykora
Penalty to Sandis Ozolinsh 2 minutes for Holding Andrew Brunette
Penalty to Pascal Dupuis 2 minutes for High Sticking Samuel Pahlsson
Penalty to Samuel Pahlsson 2 minutes for Holding Richard Park
Goal scored by Rob Niedermayer unassisted
